title: My Mobile - July 2014 (gnv64)
description:
My Mobile - July 2014
English | 102 Pages | True PDF | 13.78 mb

CONTENTS
Lead Story 20
They come at mainstream prices. And deliver exceptional performance. We take a look at new wave of budget
smartphones that are sweeping the Indian market.
Chief speak 28
We meet Kenichiro Hibi, MD, Sony India, to know more about the company's plans for the coming days, in phones, tablets and wearables. And also figure out which phone he uses.
Face to Face 32
What is new in Flickr 3.0 and where is the iconic image sharing service headed? We talk to Bernando Hernandez, head of Flickr, Yahoo Inc.
spotlight 36
From dual to octa core, are multicore processors actually making a difference or are they just a hype?
cell clues 40
Looking for a cover for your handset? Here are a few handy pointers.
sneak peek 43
HTC reveals more design wizardry in the HTC One (E8) while Oppo unleashes the first phone with a quad HD display in India, the Oppo Find 7.
just in 44
One has an octa core processor, the other a quad core one. Neither cost the earth. The Panasonic P81 and the Lava Iris X1.
Will 4G be available for mainstream users at affordable rates? Ranjan Sharma, director, technical and commercial, ZTE Telecom India, shares his thoughts. 42

Regulars
Letters 10
News 14
Consumer Forum 31
Mobile Doctor 77
Gear Guide 78
